text: The 1981/82 NTFL season was the 61st season of the Northern Territory Football League (NTFL). The Wanderers Eagles have won their eighth premiership title while defeating St Marys in the grand final by one point. ==Grand Final== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left;" |- style="background:#efefef;" ! Premiers ! GF Score ! Runner-up |- | Wanderers | 13.13 (91) - 13.12 (90) | St Marys |} ==References== Category:Northern Territory Football League seasons NTFL
title: 1981–82 NTFL season
